trans-unit.source: Represents a branch of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity" /> 的分支。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition> of each branch is determined before the branch is run.
trans-unit.target: 會先決定每個分支的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition>，再執行分支。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> that evaluates to `true` is run.
trans-unit.target: 在評估為 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> 之 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 中的第一個 `true` 已執行。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create two new instances of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> 類別的兩個新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Compensation SDK Sample from the PurchaseOrder.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 PurchaseOrder.cs 檔案中＜補償 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Compensation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用補償](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b)。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用活動的名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> object reference for the current branch activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前分支活動的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> 物件參考。

trans-unit.source: The evaluation of this condition returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: 這個條件的評估會傳回值，指出這個分支是否應執行。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> that returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" />，它會傳回指出是否應執行這個分支的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is optional on the last <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> and required in other cases.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性在 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> 中的最後一個 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 上為選擇性項目，在其他情況下則為必要項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that `Available` is of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>.
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼假設 `Available` 的型別為 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Compensation SDK Sample from the PurchaseOrder.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 PurchaseOrder.cs 檔案中＜補償 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Compensation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用補償](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b)。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示目標為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> 屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition" />。
